course.subject: HUMA
course.name: Before Mao: Traditional Chinese Society from 1800 to 1949
course.description: From the perspective of cultural anthropology, this course examines the basic structure of traditional Chinese society and culture from the late Qing to the Republican eras. Topics in rites of marriage, kinship, family organization, life and death, social and cultural meaning of food, illness and traditional Chinese medicine, education and the imperial examination system, stratification and mobility, traditional arts and crafts are examined.

reviews.author: charleszzz
reviews.title: 1800-1949中国历史片段 人类学入门 超级好的教授
reviews.comment_content: 说是1800-1949这150年的历史 其实并不是像内地中学那样从头到尾教 而是围绕一些主题展开教 例如 鸦片战争 太平天国运动等等。以一个中学学理科 历史很差的人的角度来说 内容还是很有趣的! 教授来自内地 有人类学的背景 可以说是以另外一种眼光来审视这段历史 以及超越这段时间以外的渗透中国社会的文化架构。
reviews.comment_teaching:
一开始用英语教 坦白说教授有点吃力 学生也很难明白她想表达的深层次意思。后来mandarin speaker单独开了普通话的session 有内地生 一些香港学生 和来exchange的ABC. 教授非常approachable 而且比较发散 课堂讨论非常自由随性 但是总是能学到很多东西。不是那么注重进度 交到哪儿考到哪儿 往往在课堂和学生的互动中聊到了其他有趣的话题 但是都离不开整门课教师想要传达和教授的内容。很好的人类学入门 虽然是以这段历史为载体 依托香港也能从另外一个视角来学习中国的历史 和社会／文化等方面的知识

personal opinion 这是我大学两年以来最喜欢的教授之一 超级nice
reviews.comment_grading:
整堂课30多个人 应该不是严格拉curve 基本上都来上课 project做好 final考好也不是太难 （for mandarin speaker with history taken in secondary school)

参加3次tutorial 大概10%
2个project, each=essay + 3min presentation (1-2人)
                         大概30%*2=60%
final exam=open book, open internet essay
                         大概30%

final exam就是会给一个题目 然后围绕这个题目写 不限字数语言 真正意义的开卷考 因为可以带电脑手机 教授不怕你和其他人联系 因为题目真的是原创的（搜不到）以及考验整个学期学到的东西 还挺systematic的
reviews.comment_workload: workload不大。平时一周一次课 就和去听故事一样 不明白或者有不同想法的时候就可以和教授在课堂上讨论。平时有reading 没有强制要求 但是对理解课堂内容很有帮助。基本上两个project之前两三周要和教授沟通essay的主题 写essay然后准备short pre3 with Q&A 内容和想法比essay/pre3本身更重要。final 就是复习整理一下平时的笔记 回顾教过的东西 可以带电脑手机和任何资料 所以不需要背

reviews.author: supersherlockxd
reviews.title: rip good grade course
reviews.comment_content:
其實都係講下清末民初既歷史，然後講下文化（例如家庭觀、宗教觀之類）。其實離1949真係仲有一段距離lol

btw 學校話今次開完之後就會delete成科2633呀， instructor 去埋中大做 RA，所以睇到依篇評論既你如果想刷 grade 就 bye
reviews.comment_teaching:
講真都幾垃圾，冇人聽書咁濟lol 班人傾計大聲到後面完全唔可以專心聽書

同埋佢d英文真係不知所謂搞到人好眼訓
e.g. sociology --> social logic
e.g. Christ --> Chris

比D純粹係因為佢唔會理你做乜同埋轉channel之後會發現佢其實都ok勁只係唔識用英文表達
reviews.comment_grading:
利申先，我中學冇讀hist/chist，讀依科純粹因為其他科冇位

本身冇期望但係其實冇其他人講咁差，我用一日亂吹篇take home exam佢竟然（差唔多）零負評，開心仔。同埋完全冇覺得佢有點過名（一開頭有但係似乎佢都放棄左）

Mean:
Book report: 15.3/20
Final: 30.1/40
Presentation: 24.8/30
Attendance: ??/10

My score:
Book report: 17/20
Final: 37/40
Presentation: 28/30
Attendance: ??

最後A，其實我覺得自己final個分如果唔係亂吹仲可以再高d，畢竟寫左d自己都convince唔到自己既論點。不過對比起自己 busi 科 d 分就算了lol。應該係 absolute grading，難怪會 7x% 都係 c range。
reviews.comment_workload:
Book report (書都幫你揀埋淨係短book list揀一本寫800字就得，完全係中學book report既感覺）20%
Presentation（分組可以自己分可以佢分，topic 4揀1，一個15分鐘present一份合作2000字既文）30%
Take home exam（冇錯！兩題攞返屋企寫既essay！！仲要有一題係情境題）40%
Attendance+participation （根本唔覺得有人會有分lol其實佢自問自答都幾可憐）10%

其實如果有好teammate就ok既，我個組全部都係exchange/international所以有中文既嘢都要我carry，有英文既嘢就佢哋carry

reviews.author: christygg
reviews.title: unexpected grading
reviews.comment_content: 讲毛泽东前中国的发展，由中国百日维新，鸦片战争，至晚清新政，辛亥革命，五四运动到南京政府。学过历史会觉得好容易。
reviews.comment_teaching: 上堂照ppt读，好闷，大家都系做自己野，有时问下大家看法，得几个肯答
reviews.comment_grading: 本来reg黎刷grade，final essay收到的评价极好，话'well elaborated'无负评... 但卑分紧，得7成，可能prof新黎，派左个c range.....
reviews.comment_workload: 阅书报告，presentation+report, final essay, four presentation days count students' attendance

reviews.author: vicknt
reviews.title: Good grade, not that clear teaching
reviews.comment_content:
I personally feel that this course covers a too long period (1800-1949) and a too big topic (the whole traditional society instead of a specific aspect), which makes the focus of this course a little bit ambiguous. each topic seems to be independent from each other and no way interconnected.
the prof lists out many many topics at the beginning of the semester but doesnt really talk abt each of them. actually she prints out notes for students each lecture but seldom completes all the slides.
however this course teaches some methods to study humanity, and they can applied to daily reading. Overall i wont recommend this course but one can still learn something from it.
reviews.comment_teaching:
It might be due to the limitation of language, I personally think the teaching is not very attractive. However she often gives much more information during tutorials and field trips when speaking chinese is allowed. But I have to say she is really nice and willing to help.
There are quizzes at the beginning of lectures sometimes, to help summarize the content of last lecture. the quizzes dont count into final grade but they are very helpful. i guess u wont miss much even  if u dont attend a class as long as u come earlier nd take the quiz next time
reviews.comment_workload:
2 reports & 2 pre3 & 1 final
the final is also report writing. preparing the material needed for your writing beforehand is allowed.
presentations are based on the reports submitted, more like discussion as students simply repeat their points mentioned in the report and answer questions from others.
both english and chinese are acceptable

reviews.author: johndoe
reviews.comment_content:
1.Introduction: What does “traditional Chinese society” mean?

2.High Qing: an overview of the imperial state
Readings:

3.State and Society: the story of Tiannhou

4.Festival and Community: China’s wild west

5.How was business conducted without the company law?

6.From the White Lotus Rebellion to the Taiping Rebellion

7.Was China “opened” by the Opium Wars?

8.From Empire to Nation: Crisis and Revolution

9.Representing citizenship

10.The girl student: new womanhood

11.The Rise of Popular Entertainment

似乎是用一個傳統歷史教學之外, 另外的面向審視以上主題的歷史, 不過professor教得太慢(應該是主題太多), 基本上10,11 沒有教
reviews.comment_teaching:
- 因為本學期有international students, professor被迫用發音不標準+不流利的英文講課, 加上課室音響的treble太多, 無論講課的還是聽課的都痛苦

-課堂內容有點分散, 有時professor會教得不太清楚, 記得有不明白的要提出

-professor無論在堂上還是課後討論都是超級nice
reviews.comment_grading:
1. Attending the “Research and Writing Advisory Tutorials”, using the skills in writing two tutorial reports (attending 3 sessions at least) (6% of course grade)

2. book report project + field trip report project participating in course and tutorial discussions (64% of course grade)

3. Final exam (30% of final grade)

還可以, 只要用功用心, 都會有B+
reviews.comment_workload:
- ppt handouts只會於課堂上派發, 單看ppt亦難以找出教學重點, 上堂要全神貫注抄筆記

- 一個book report , 一個field trip report, 均為group project(寫好essay一星期後進行presentation), 寫essay前盡量與professor商量寫作想法及方向, presentation的Q&A session積極參與發問(有participation分), 基本沒問題

- Open book final, 3小時內選擇一條題目, 應用已有知識(課堂+presentation同學的發現+你的已有知識)寫一篇essay, 不能使用電子材料, 想法比起字數更重要
